sourcesContent: import axios from "axios"; import { useCallback, useEffect, useState } from "react"; function SingleTicketView() { const [data, setData] = useState([]); // const [isFocused, setIsFocused] = useState(false); const [value, setValue] = useState(""); const [rows, setRows] = useState(3); const handleChange = (event) => { setValue(event.target.value); setRows(event.target.value.split("\n").length); // Adjust rows based on line breaks }; const fetchData = useCallback(async () => { try { const response = await axios.get("/api/ticket/:id"); setData(response.data); } catch (error) { // eslint-disable-next-line no-console console.error(error); } }, []); useEffect(() => { fetchData(); }, [fetchData]); console.log(data); return (
